FuncDef:
The confederation peer-as command configures the number of each sub-AS of a confederation.
The undo confederation peer-as command removes the specified sub-AS from the confederation. The confederation peer-as command configures the number of each sub-AS of a confederation. The undo confederation peer-as command removes the specified sub-AS from the confederation. By default, no sub-AS number of the confederation is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an AS number.
For an integral AS number, the value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.
For an AS number in dotted notation, the value is in the format of x.y, where x and y are integers ranging from 1 to 65535 and from 0 to 65535, respectively.

ExtraInfo: A large AS may contain a huge number of fully meshed IBGP peer relationships. In this situation, configure a confederation. To configure the number of each sub-AS of the confederation, run the confederation peer-as command.
